```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(janeaustenr)
```

2 knihy - střední hodn. (mean), standardní odchylka (sd), rozptyl (variance) délek slov, graficky rozdělení délek slov
```{r}
books <- austen_books() %>% 
  group_by(book) %>% 
  group_split()
```

```{r}
books_word <- books %>% 
  #.[c(1,2)] %>% 
  map(~unnest_tokens(.x, word, text)) %>% 
  map(~.x %>% mutate(word_length = str_length(word))) %>% 
  bind_rows()
```


```{r}
books_word %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = word_length)) +
  geom_histogram() + 
  facet_wrap(~book)
```
